subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Giants’ batting coach Joe Lefebvre, a man who hit 34 home runs in his own major league career, sees the irony in critiquing the form of Barry Bonds as he goes for 755.
snippet: Giants’ batting coach Joe Lefebvre, a man who hit 34 home runs in his own major league career, sees the irony in critiquing the form of Barry Bonds as he goes for 755.
